overview: A story in three colors. A girl trapped in three levels. Forest Green, Red in flight and a gray reality for a family conflict. When mental escape is your only defense, salvation can come only through fiction.
tagline: A story in three colors. A girl trapped in three levels. Forest Green, Red in flight and a gray reality for a family conflict. When mental escape is your only defense, salvation can come only through fiction.
title: Policromía
